name: Ratings
description: Professional rating system for Jellyfin. Rate media with 1-10 stars, view detailed user ratings on hover, and see rating badges on media cards. Optimized for large libraries with lazy loading.
overview: Comprehensive rating plugin with star-based UI, average ratings display, detailed user rating popups, and performance-optimized card overlays for large media libraries.

versions.changelog: Fix chat 401: Pass X-Emby-Authorization header with token in all chat API calls.
Fix chat 401: Add [AllowAnonymous] at controller class level.
Fix chat messages not appearing: API now returns {messages, typingUsers} format expected by JS. Added GetTypingUsers method.
Fix chat 401 Unauthorized - change endpoints from [Authorize] to [AllowAnonymous] with manual user validation.
Fix chat: online count API endpoint, input CSS layout, load users immediately on open.
Fix chat settings not exposed in API config endpoint - chat button now appears when enabled.
Fix critical JavaScript error causing plugin to fail (duplicate variable declaration in init function).
Live Chat: Real-time chat for connected users with emoji picker, GIF support (Tenor), moderator system, user banning, admin clear all. Chat replaces Cast button in header.

Multi-language localization system with 16 languages: English, Spanish, Chinese, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese, German, French, Korean, Italian, Turkish, Polish, Dutch, Arabic, Hindi, Lithuanian. Language selector dropdown in UI, admin can set default language.
Settings redesign, badge display profiles with H/V axis, rating widget repositioned above detail ribbon with responsive mobile layout.
